title: Bitcoin tops $118,000 for the first time, as the cryptocurrency continues to climb to new heights
description: Bitcoin has reached yet another all-time high, surpassing $118,000 for the first time on Friday — as a flood of money continues to move into spot bitcoin ETFs, all while U.S. President Donald Trump’s crypto-friendly influence makes its way through Washington. According to data from CoinMarketCap, the going price for bitcoin climbed as high as […]

title: Bitcoin surpasses $118K, its second all-time high, in less than 24 hours
description: Factors contributing to Bitcoin’s surge include the pro-crypto stance of President Trump, which has spurred greater interest from institutional investors.

title: Bitcoin surges 101% rallying past $1,16,000; altcoins to follow as market enters ‘greed’ zone
description: Crypto sentiment stays strong as Fear & Greed Index signals ‘greed’; next target seen at $1,20,000

title: Bitcoin rose to a new record
description: The cryptocurrency Bitcoin rose to record highs on Thursday, driven by investor demand and crypto-friendly policies from the Trump administration.…

title: Bitcoin Stocks To Add to Your Watchlist – July 8th
description: Bit Digital, Core Scientific, Marathon Digital, IREN, Cleanspark, BTCS, and Cipher Mining are the seven Bitcoin stocks to watch today, according to MarketBeat’s stock screener tool.
